project_descr: to support the Ministry of Finance and Planning to lead on the effectiveness of a partnership framework for development finance that responds to the changes in the aid environment and enhances transparency and accountability of development funding.

donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)
